title: Ep. 91 Must See TV - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://VuoriClothing.com/MOM and get 20% off your first purchase plus free shipping on U.S. orders over $75 - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA. - Get 25% off when you go to https://liquidiv.com/ and use code WMMA at checkout. - Head to https://Ancestry.com/WMMA to start your free trial today! - Go to https://RebateKey.com to sign up for FREE today and never pay full price online again! - Go to https://GetSunday.com/WMMA for $20 off your custom lawn plan!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's just the Main Mommy this week. She discusses her new favorite show Cobra Kai, guilty pleasure foods, and her flosser controversy. She responds to listener emails and voicemails regarding small peener preferences, bathroom coffee, an anti-vaxxer boyfriend, flying with kids and more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Hack," "Pazsitzky Effect," or anything else from the mom world please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
